body:
any news about solution for blocking numbers?

I have a group of 100 numbers, and when I try to send msg to them, after 20 msg my number is blocked!!

comment_data.body: Do you use phonenumbers or JIDs to send the messages? What is your interval between sending messages? Are all 100 numbers actually registered in whatsapp?

What do you mean JID is not working? Try using proper JIDs before reporting problems

    $w->Message("999999999999@s.whatsapp.net", "hi");
Can you post the tx/rx nodes debug info when sending a message to a JID?

and WhatsAPI already fix the JID for you!! so for sure it will not work if I add the @s.whatsapp.net, because it will be duplcated

$messageHash["to"] = $to . "@" . $this->_whatsAppServer;

this when send to phone number
